title: Finance Blogger Reunion
description:
This week, Felix Salmon and Stacy-Marie Ishmael are joined by their fellow finance-blogging alum, Cardiff Garcia. Cardiff sheds some light on the current situation in Cuba, they discuss skewed incentives in investment banking, and the state of bookselling. 

In the Plus segment: The Fed chair decision.


Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @s_m_i 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
